definition: to return home/fig. to retire from public life
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
to come back to one's hometown in silken robes (idiom); to return in glory

(Korean term) women who returned to Korea after being abducted during the Manchu invasions of Korea in the 17th century, only to be regarded as defiled and therefore ostracized, even by their own families

sentences.english: Zhao Zilong reported to you that Jingzhou is facing danger, you wanna go back, so you came up with this idea.
sentences.chinese: 方纔趙子龍報說荊州危急，你欲還鄉，故推此意。

sentences.english: The performance of Guangxi Opera Return to his Native Place was a big success.
sentences.chinese: 桂劇《大儒還鄉》的演出取得了巨大成功。

sentences.english: Anybody coming back home without achievements is a loser, " Hu said."
sentences.chinese: 若不能衣錦還鄉，那他就是一個失敗者。

sentences.english: Since then, Zeus let him return life fairy, he just drift, and island to time.
sentences.chinese: 此後，宙斯命仙女放他還鄉，他才漂流到斯刻里亞島。

sentences.english: Often these people are encouraged by the stories of the few who successfully return to their homelands in wealth and luxury.
sentences.chinese: 這些人往往從少數衣錦還鄉者的故事受到鼓舞。

sentences.english: As hoped, the Home Returning Corps took fright and fled in the night.
sentences.chinese: 還鄉團果然害怕，連夜逃跑了。

sentences.english: When they had made enough money, they returned to the village for good.
sentences.chinese: 如果賺夠了錢，他們便“告老還鄉”。

sentences.english: Bursting into the inner courtyards, they found that the Pan Corps had already gone.
sentences.chinese: 等他們衝進裏院時，發現潘帶着還鄉團早己跑掉了。

sentences.english: I'll come back with honors someday.
sentences.chinese: 有朝一日，我會衣錦還鄉。

sentences.english: The Return of the Native by Thomas Hardy (Nanjing: Yilin Press, 1997).
Wo first to the right Bastard retirement, four items to the ticket and return home from Xiang was the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 太和初，以右庶子致仕，四品給券還鄉自珦始。

sentences.english: He left poor and later returned with ship coming home.
sentences.chinese: 他離開時貧窮，但後來衣錦還鄉。

definition: person living or traveling far from home
